conversion_verification.notes: Successful 3D axonometric projection with clear wall thickness and floor differentiation.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D representation. Solid wall geometry and clean perspective. No ceiling interference.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout is highly faithful. Room counts (3 Bedrooms, Kitchen, Living, Balconies) match exactly. Walls align with 2D plan proportions.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement (beds, dining table, sofas) matches the plan layout accurately.

visual_clarity.notes: Crisp clay-style render. Clear distinction between openings. Minimal rendering noise.

detected_errors.description: Some balcony door frame details are slightly abstracted compared to original 2D swing indicators.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that meticulously translates the 2D floor plan layout into a geometrically faithful 3D model.
